overview: Although the beautiful women you see in PRIVATE productions seem sexually savvy, guess where many of them learned the tricks of the trade?  Kinkmeister/director Frank Thring lets us in on the answer in "The Academy," a specialized finishing school where pretty porn pupils are taught everything from elocution to the art of proper anal protocol.  Set along France's Cote d'Azur during the Cannes Film Festival, "The Academy" delivers an erotic education with 15 amazing anals, a quartet of double penetrations and an astounding two dozen facials featuring ten of the world's most stunning starlets.The only requirement for graduation from this institution is lots and lots of homework!
tagline: Sssh... it's the best kept secret in porn
title: The Academy
